page.title: 05CLUBS 2
page.content: ...................................... CATWG PRIMARY SCHOOL IS USED WEEKLY FOR EVENING MEETINGS OF THE CASTELL NEDD CHESS CLUB (MONDAY) AND THE GIRL GUIDES AND BROWNIES (WEDNESDAY).OTHER GROUPS WOMENS INSTITUTE AND SCHOOL P.T.A. MEET MONTHLY AT THE SCHOOL.THE SCOUTS AND CUBS HAVE THEIR OWN HALL WHERE THEY MEET ON WEDNESDAY EVENINGS.GROUPS ASSOCIATED WITH THE CHURCH ARE THE YOUNG WIVES,MOTHERS UNION,WOMENS GUILD,MENS SOCIETY AND BELLRINGERS WHILST SUNDAY SCHOOL FOR CHILDREN IS HELD IN THE ADJOINING CHURCH HALL SUNDAY MORNINGS AT 9.30. THIS HALL IS ALSO USED FOR WEEKLY KEEP FIT AND OLD TYME DANCING. ...................................... FOR FURTHER INFORMATION REFER TO PAGE4.(CLUBS1) ...................................... .
